services.title: Innovation Management
services.shortDescription: Build the innovation capability your organisation actually needs  - and make it last
services.fullDescription: Most organisations know they need to innovate  - few know how to make it systematic. I work with leadership teams to build the processes, culture, and capabilities that turn innovation from a buzzword into a genuine competitive advantage. From designing the function itself to coaching the leaders who run it, I make sure the work outlasts the engagement.
whenYouNeedIt: You're a C-suite leader who knows innovation matters but doesn't yet have the structure to make it happen consistently
You're scaling fast and need repeatable innovation processes before the chaos sets in
You're running a large organisation and the old ways of working are actively holding you back

services.title: Human-Centred Design
services.shortDescription: Stop building things people don't want  - design from insight, test before you invest
services.fullDescription: The most expensive mistake an organisation can make is building the wrong thing beautifully. I use research, design thinking, and rapid prototyping to make sure you're solving real problems for real people  - before significant time or money is spent. From customer journey mapping to tested prototypes, the work gives you confidence to invest in the right direction.
whenYouNeedIt: You have a product idea but aren't sure if real customers will actually want it
Your customer experience has gaps  - complaints, drop-offs, friction  - and you need to understand why
You're tackling a complex problem and need a structured way to find and test solutions quickly

services.title: Transformation Strategy
services.shortDescription: Turn complex change into clear action  - with stakeholders aligned and outcomes that stick
services.fullDescription: Transformation fails when it's done *to* people rather than *with* them. I work alongside leadership teams to design operating models that people actually want to work in  - and then build the internal capability to make the change real and lasting. Whether it's a full organisational redesign or a targeted digital transformation, I focus on what comes after the PowerPoint: implementation, adoption, and results.
whenYouNeedIt: You're part way through a transformation and it's losing momentum or stakeholder buy-in
You need to redesign how your organisation works but don't know where to start
Your leadership team is aligned on the destination but not on how to get there

services.title: AI Capability Building
services.shortDescription: Cut through the AI hype  - find what's actually worth building and help your teams use it well
services.fullDescription: Most organisations are drowning in AI possibilities but paralysed about where to actually start. I help teams cut through the noise  - identifying the use cases with real business impact, building the capability to execute them, and making sure AI becomes a genuine working habit rather than a one-off experiment. No hype, no black boxes  - just practical, measurable progress.
whenYouNeedIt: You know AI matters for your business but your team doesn't know where to begin
You've seen AI demos that look impressive but haven't found a practical path to implementation
You want your organisation to use AI consistently  - not just in one team or one project
whatsIncluded: AI discovery and use case identification
Use case prioritisation and business case development
